name: Icarus (itch) (Vongrid)
description:
Game created for the Cultural Heritage Game Jam by:

Chris Tsironis-Game Developer

Gregory Skamagkis-Game Developer

Michael Kostoglou-Game Artist

During his imprisonment with his son, Icarus, in the labyrinth of King Minos, Daedalus has an idea in order to escape: Creating wings from a pair of feathers and wax and escape. He warns his son, not to fly too close to the sun because the wax will melt and the wings will be destroyed. The two men break it and head towards their freedom. Forgetting his father's advice, Icarus begins to fly dangerously high and realizes that if he does not land soon, the wings will disintegrate. Will he manage to reach the nearest island or will his recklessness be fatal?
